item.title: Bi-directional Relations
item.description: Bi-directional Relations # Problem # If I have a graph: A <-1-> B <-2-> C where A, B, C are subjects and objects linked with predicates 1, 2 (bidirectional). How can I get C using a path? Test data # Fig 1.: Graph diagram of test data Show the test data in nquads format <A> <predicate-1> <B> . <B> <predicate-1> <A> . <B> <predicate-2> <C> .
